parts.headline: This week’s covers
parts.description: How we saw the world

parts.headline: What’s wrong with the banks
parts.description: Rising interest rates have left banks exposed. Time to fix the system—again

parts.headline: Will Bibi break Israel?
parts.subheadline: Binyamin Netanyahu and a constitutional crisis
parts.description: When Israel’s best and brightest are up in arms it is time to worry

parts.headline: Ron DeSantis emboldens Vladimir Putin
parts.description: Florida’s governor has blundered by saying Ukraine is not a vital American interest

parts.headline: The AUKUS pact is a model for Western allies
parts.description: Pooling talent and resources is the only way to match China’s heft

parts.headline: Why America is going to look more like Texas
parts.description: Lessons from the surge of the Lone Star State

parts.description: Stability but no cigar
